paul le

I'm Paul. I solve problems.

By day, I solve healthcare system integration problems over at iNTERFACEWARE, a software company based in Toronto. I design, build, test, and implement various healthare system integration solutions for hospitals.

By night, I try my best to solve what I believe is a big problem in physics education: how to keep students engaged in a beautiful subject that often stigmatized as being difficult and boring. Other projects I work on include a variety of Jekyll themes that I design, build, and maintain on GitHub, as well as a physics simulation engine built in Python.

I am always on the lookout for interesting projects to work on, or passionate people to work with. Please do not hesitate to reach out if that interests you.
